name: THEA 151A
title: Studies in Performance: African American Theater Arts Troupe
description: Studies in drama; emphasis on African American theater taken in connection with participation in a theater arts sponsored production. Enrollment by audition only, and limited to those persons chosen to take part in a particular production. May be repeated for credit.
class_notes: See audition and enrollment info. on the Theater Arts Auditions page:http://theater.ucsc.edu/programs/auditions-theater-arts
